name: Lemon-Garlic Roasted Potatoes
author: laurieish
summary: I've tried lots of roasted potato variations where the seasonings get lost, and you're left with a bland or oily taste. The lemon and garlic in this version really shines through. Plus these are simple to make, either as a quick side dish, or a fast snack!
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Cut abnormally large potatoes in half so all potatoes are around the same size (no bigger than 1/2 of a ping pong ball)
Transfer to a metal baking pan
Mix lemon juice and olive oil together and drizzle over potatoes
Sprinkle with garlic powder and salt
Toss until well coated and spread evenly in the pan
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes
Stir and bake until tender, about 10 minutes more
